# modelCathRes

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/modelCathRes)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=modelCathRes)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of modelCathRes is to model the evolution of aluminium cells cathode resistance with age.

## Installation

You can install the released version of modelCathRes from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("modelCathRes")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("OlivierGranacher/modelCathRes")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
#library(modelCathRes)
## basic example code
```
